section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: ldexp calculates the value ldexpf is identical, save that it takes and returns float rather than double values.

section.title: Returns
section.p: ldexp returns the calculated value. Underflow and overflow both set errno to ERANGE. On underflow, ldexp and ldexpf return 0.0. On overflow, ldexp returns plus or minus HUGE_VAL.
